  set item [lindex [$tree children {}] end]
  lappend tplid $item
  Select [expr {[llength $tplid]-1}]
  alited::Message3 $msg 3
  return 1
}




Cancel [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Handles "Cancel" button.

Cancel ?args?
Parameters
argsOptional arguments.

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Cancel {args} {
  # Handles "Cancel" button.

  variable win
  namespace upvar ::alited obDl3 obDl3
  alited::CloseDlg
  SaveIni
  $obDl3 res $win 0
}




Change [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Handles "Change template" button.

Change

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Change {} {
  # Handles "Change template" button.

  namespace upvar ::alited obDl3 obDl3
  variable tpllist
  variable tplcont
  variable tplpos
  variable tplpla
  variable place
  variable tplkeys
  variable tplkey
  variable tpl
  namespace upvar ::alited al al
  if {[set isel [Selected index]] eq {}} return
  set tpllist [lreplace $tpllist $isel $isel $tpl]
  set tplcont [lreplace $tplcont $isel $isel [Text]]
  set tplpos [lreplace $tplpos $isel $isel [Pos [lindex $tplpos $isel]]]
  set tplpla [lreplace $tplpla $isel $isel $place]
  set tplkeys [lreplace $tplkeys $isel $isel $tplkey]
  UpdateTree
  Select $isel
  set msg [string map [list %n [incr isel]] $al(MC,tplupd)]
  alited::Message3 $msg 3
}




ClearCbx [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Helper to clear the combobox's selection.

ClearCbx

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::ClearCbx {} {
  # Helper to clear the combobox's selection.

  namespace upvar ::alited obDl3 obDl3
  [$obDl3 CbxKey] selection clear
}




Delete [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Handles "Delete template" button.

Delete

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Delete {} {
  # Handles "Delete template" button.

  namespace upvar ::alited al al obDl3 obDl3
  variable tpllist
  variable tplcont
  variable tplpos
  variable tplpla
  variable tplkeys
  variable tplid
  variable win
  if {[set isel [Selected index]] eq {}} return
  set nsel [expr {$isel+1}]
  set msg [string map [list %n $nsel] $al(MC,tpldelq)]
  if {![alited::msg yesno warn $msg NO -centerme $win]} {
    return
  }
  foreach tl {tpllist tplcont tplpos tplpla tplid tplkeys} {
    set $tl [lreplace [set $tl] $isel $isel]
  }
  set llen [expr {[llength $tpllist]-1}]
  if {$isel>$llen} {set isel $llen}
  UpdateTree
  if {$llen>=0} {after idle "alited::unit_tpl::Select $isel"}
  set msg [string map [list %n $nsel] $al(MC,tplrem)]
  alited::Message3 $msg 3
}




Focus [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Sets the focus on the template list's item.

Focus isel
Parameters
iselindex of item

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Focus {isel} {
  # Sets the focus on the template list's item.
  #   isel - index of item

  namespace upvar ::alited obDl3 obDl3
  set tree [$obDl3 TreeTpl]
  $tree selection set $isel
  $tree see $isel
  $tree focus $isel
}




GetKeyList [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Creates a key list for "Keys" combobox.

GetKeyList

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::GetKeyList {} {
  # Creates a key list for "Keys" combobox.

  namespace upvar ::alited obDl3 obDl3
  RegisterKeys
  set keys [linsert [alited::keys::VacantList] 0 ""]
  [$obDl3 CbxKey] configure -values $keys
}




Help [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Handles "Help" button.

Help ?args?
Parameters
argsOptional arguments.

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Help {args} {
  # Handles "Help" button.

  variable win
  alited::Help $win
}




HelpMe [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

'Help' for start.

HelpMe ?args?
Parameters
argsOptional arguments.

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::HelpMe {args} {
  # 'Help' for start.

  variable win
  alited::HelpMe $win
}




Import [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Handles "Import templates" button.

Import

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Import {} {
  # Handles "Import templates" button.

  namespace upvar ::alited al al obDl3 obDl3 DATAUSERINI DATAUSERINI
  variable tpl
  variable tplkey
  variable place
  variable win
  set al(filename) alited.ini
  set fname [$obDl3 chooser tk_getOpenFile alited::al(filename)  -initialdir $DATAUSERINI -parent $win]
  if {$fname eq {}} return
  set imported 0
  set wtxt [$obDl3 TexTpl]
  set filecont [::apave::readTextFile $fname]
  foreach line [split $filecont \n] {
    if {[string match tpl=* $line]} {
      set line [string range $line 4 end]
      if {![catch {lassign $line tpl tplkey cont pos place}]} {
        set cont [string map [list $::alited::EOL \n] $cont]
        if {$tpl ne {} && $cont ne {} && $pos ne {}} {
          if {![string is double -strict $pos]} {set pos 1.0}
          $wtxt delete 1.0 end
          $wtxt insert end $cont
          incr imported [Add $pos]
        }
      }
    }
  }
  alited::Message3 [string map "%n $imported" [msgcat::mc "Number of imported templates: %n"]] 3
}




InText [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Goes into the template's text and sets the cursor on it.

InText wtxt
Parameters
wtxttext's path

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::InText {wtxt} {
  # Goes into the template's text and sets the cursor on it.
  #   wtxt - text's path

  variable tplpos
  namespace upvar ::alited obDl3 obDl3
  if {[set isel [Selected index no]] ne {}} {
    set pos [lindex $tplpos $isel]
    ::tk::TextSetCursor $wtxt $pos
  }
}




Ok [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Handles "OK" button.

Ok ?args?
Parameters
argsOptional arguments.

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Ok {args} {
  # Handles "OK" button.

  variable win
  variable tplpos
  variable tplcont
  variable tplpla
  variable dosel
  namespace upvar ::alited al al obDl3 obDl3
  alited::CloseDlg
  if {!$dosel || [set isel [Selected index]] eq {}} {
    focus [$obDl3 TreeTpl]
    return
  }
  set tex [lindex $tplcont $isel]
  set pos [lindex $tplpos $isel]
  set pla [lindex $tplpla $isel]
  SaveIni
  $obDl3 res $win [list $tex $pos $pla]
}




Pos [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Returns a cursor position in the template's text.

Pos ?pos?
Parameters
posif not "", it's a position to be returned by default; optional, default ""
Return value

Returns a cursor position in the template's text.

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Pos {{pos {}}} {
  # Returns a cursor position in the template's text.
  #   pos - if not "", it's a position to be returned by default

  namespace upvar ::alited obDl3 obDl3
  set wtxt [$obDl3 TexTpl]
  if {$wtxt eq [focus] || $pos eq {}} {
    return [$wtxt index insert]
  }
  return $pos
}




ReadIni [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Gets templates' data from al(TPL,list) saved in alited.ini.

ReadIni

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::ReadIni {} {
  # Gets templates' data from al(TPL,list) saved in alited.ini.

  namespace upvar ::alited al al
  foreach tv {tpllist tplcont tplkeys tplpos tplpla} {
    variable $tv
    set $tv [list]
  }
  foreach lst $al(TPL,list) {
    if {![catch {lassign $lst tpl key cont pos pla}]} {
      set cont [string map [list $::alited::EOL \n] $cont]
      if {$tpl ne {} && $cont ne {} && $pos ne {}} {
        if {![string is double -strict $pos]} {set pos 1.0}
        lappend tpllist $tpl
        lappend tplcont $cont
        lappend tplkeys $key
        lappend tplpos $pos
        lappend tplpla $pla
      }
    }
  }
}




RegisterKeys [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Registers key bindings of templates, to save them to alited.ini afterwards.

RegisterKeys

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::RegisterKeys {} {
  # Registers key bindings of templates, to save them to alited.ini afterwards.

  namespace upvar ::alited al al
  variable tpllist
  variable tplcont
  variable tplkeys
  variable tplpos
  variable tplpla
  variable ilast
  alited::keys::Delete template
  set al(TPL,list) [list]
  foreach tpl $tpllist key $tplkeys cont $tplcont pos $tplpos pla $tplpla {
    set cont [string map [list \n $::alited::EOL] $cont]
    lappend al(TPL,list) [list $tpl $key $cont $pos $pla]
    alited::keys::Add template $tpl $key [list $cont $pos $pla]
  }
}




SaveIni [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Puts templates' data to al(TPL,list) to save in alited.ini.

SaveIni

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::SaveIni {} {
  # Puts templates' data to al(TPL,list) to save in alited.ini.

  variable ilast
  set ilast [Selected index no]
  RegisterKeys
  alited::ini::SaveIni
}




Select [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Selects an item of the template list.

Select ?item?
Parameters
itemindex (ID) of template list; optional, default ""

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Select {{item {}}} {
  # Selects an item of the template list.
  #   item - index (ID) of template list

  variable tpllist
  variable tplkey
  variable tplkeys
  variable tplcont
  variable tplid
  variable tplpla
  variable tpl
  variable place
  namespace upvar ::alited obDl3 obDl3
  if {$item eq {}} {set item [Selected item no]}
  if {$item ne {}} {
    if {[string is digit $item]} {  ;# the item is an index
      set item [lindex $tplid $item]
    }
    set tree [$obDl3 TreeTpl]
    set isel [$tree index $item]
    set tpl [lindex $tpllist $isel]
    set tplkey [lindex $tplkeys $isel]
    set place [lindex $tplpla $isel]
    set wtxt [$obDl3 TexTpl]
    $wtxt delete 1.0 end
    $wtxt insert end [lindex $tplcont $isel]
    if {[$tree selection] ne $item} {
      $tree selection set $item
    }
    $tree see $item
    $tree focus $item
  }
}




Selected [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Gets ID or index of currently selected item of the template list.

Selected what ?domsg?
Parameters
whatif "index", gets a current item's index
domsgif yes, shows a message about the selection; optional, default yes

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Selected {what {domsg yes}} {
  # Gets ID or index of currently selected item of the template list.
  #   what - if "index", gets a current item's index
  #   domsg - if yes, shows a message about the selection

  namespace upvar ::alited al al obDl3 obDl3
  variable tpllist
  set tree [$obDl3 TreeTpl]
  if {[set isel [$tree selection]] eq {} && [set isel [$tree focus]] eq {} && $domsg} {
    alited::Message3 $al(MC,tplsel) 4
  }
  if {$isel ne {} && $what eq {index}} {
    set isel [$tree index $isel]
  }
  return $isel
}




Text [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Returns the contents of the template's text.

Text
Return value

Returns the contents of the template's text.

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::Text {} {
  # Returns the contents of the template's text.

  namespace upvar ::alited obDl3 obDl3
  return [[$obDl3 TexTpl] get 1.0 {end -1 char}]
}




UpdateTree [::alited::unit_tpl]unit_tpl, Top

Updates the template list.

UpdateTree ?saveini?
Parameters
saveinisave templates in ini-file; optional, default yes

Show source


proc ::alited::unit_tpl::UpdateTree {{saveini yes}} {
  # Updates the template list.
  #   saveini - save templates in ini-file

  namespace upvar ::alited al al obDl3 obDl3
  variable tpllist
  variable tplkeys
  variable tplid
  variable ilast
  set tree [$obDl3 TreeTpl]
  $tree delete [$tree children {}]
  set tplid [list]
  set item0 {}
  foreach tpl $tpllist tplkey $tplkeys {
    set item [$tree insert {} end -values [list $tpl $tplkey]]
    if {$item0 eq {}} {set item0 $item}
    lappend tplid $item
  }
  if {$item0 ne {} && $ilast<0} {Focus $item0}
  ClearCbx
  if {$saveini} SaveIni
}

alited

What's that

Links

Inevitable blah-blah

Commands

BalloonDisplays a message in a balloon window.

Balloon1Shows a balloon about non-existing file.

CheckRunRuns "Check Tcl".

CheckSourceSources check.tcl (at need).

CloseDlgTries to close a Help dialogue, open non-modal aside by the current dialogue.

CursorAtEndSets the cursor at the end of a field.

ExitCloses alited application.

FgFgBoldGets foregrounds of normal and colored text of current color scheme and red color of TODOs.

HelpShows a help file for a procedure.

HelpAboutShows "About..." dialogue.

HelpAlitedShows a main help of alited.

HelpFileReads and shows a help file.

HelpFnameGets a help file's name.

HelpMeShows a help file for a procedure with "Don't show again" checkbox.

IsRoundIntChecks whether an integer equals roundly to other integer.

ListPavedReturn a list of apave objects for dialogues.

main_user_dirsGets names of main user directories for settings.

MessageDisplays a message in statusbar.

Message2Displays a message in statusbar of secondary dialogue ($obDl2).

Message3Displays a message in statusbar of tertiary dialogue ($obDl3).

msgShows a message and asks for an answer.

msgcatMessagesSets common localized messages.

NormalizeFileNameRemoves spec.characters from a file/dir name (sort of normalizing it).

open_files_and_raiseOpens files of CLI.

p+Sums two text positions straightforward: lines & columns separately.

raise_windowRaises the app's window.

RunRuns Tcl/Tk script.

run_remoteRuns a command that was started by another process.

source_e_menuSources e_menu.tcl at need.

TclexeGets Tcl's executable file.

TipMessageShows a tip on status message and clears the status message.

alited::about

Commands

AboutShows "About" dialogue.

textImagedMakes the feather blink.

alited::bar

Commands

BARRuns the tab bar's method.

ColorBarMakes the bar of tabs to have a "marked tab" color consistent with current color scheme.

ControlTabSwitches between last two active tabs.

CurrentControlTabKeeps a list of last switched files, to switch between last two.

CurrentTabGets an attribute of the current tab.

CurrentTabIDGets ID of the current tab.

DisableTabLeftChecks for left tabs to disable "select all at left".

DisableTabRightChecks for right tabs to disable "select all at right".

FileNameGets a file name of a tab.

FileTIDGets a tab's ID of a file name.

FillBarFills the bar of tabs.

GetBarStateGets attributes of a tab that are specific for alited.

GetTabStateGets attributes of a tab.

InsertTabInserts a new tab into the beginning of bar of tabs.

OnControlClickShows a number of tabs selected by Ctrl+Click.

OnTabMoveHandles moving a tab in the bar.

OnTabSelectionHandles selecting a tab in the bar.

PopupTipMakes tooltips (full file names) for popup menu items.

SelFileOpen a file from the file list even when it's closed (the file list may be open due to -tearoff option).

SelTabMakes a tab selected / unselected.

SelTabAllMakes all tabs selected / unselected.

SelTabLeftMakes all left tabs selected / unselected.

SelTabRightMakes all right tabs selected / unselected.

SelTabVisMakes visible tabs selected / unselected.

SetBarStateSets attributes of the tab bar that are specific for alited.

SetTabStateSets attributes of a tab.

SortSorts tabs by names.

UniqueListTabReturns a unique tab name for a file.

UniqueTabReturns a unique name for a tab.

NotesFileGets a file name of notes.

OpenSelFilesOpens selected files of listbox.

ProcEOLTransforms \n to "EOL chars" and vise versa.

ProcMessage2Handles clicking on message label. Shows the message and if it is about TODO, selects the corresponding project.

ProjectEnterProcesses double-clicking and pressing Enter on the project list. Cancels selecting projects if there are old reminders.

ProjectNameGets a project name from its file name.

SaveDataSaves some data.

SelectAllFilesSelects all files of listbox.

SelectedGets a currently selected project's index.

SelFilesChecks for a selection of file listbox. Returns: list of listbox's path and the selection or {}.

SortRemsSorts reminders by date.

Tab1Creates a main tab of "Project".

Tab2Creates Options tab of "Project".

Tab3Creates Template tab of "Project".

TabFileInfoFills a listbox with a list of project files.

TemplateCreates a project by template as set in Template tab. The template can contain directories or files (indented for subdirectories). The files satisfy glob-patterns: changelog, license, licence, readme.

TplDefaultSets default contents of project template.

TplDefaultTextGets default contents of project template.

UpdateTplListsUpdates lists of template data, setting the current template on the top.

UpdateTplTextUpdates the template text.

UpdateTreeFills a list of projects.

ValidProjectChecks if a project's options are valid.

ViewDirShows file chooser just to view the project's dir

alited::tool

Commands

_closeCloses e_menu (being an internal procedure) by force.

_runRuns e_menu's item of menu.mnu.

AfterStartRuns commands after starting alited.

AfterStartDlgDialogue to enter a command before running "Tools/Run"

BeforeRunRuns commands before running "Tools/Run"

BeforeRunDialogueDialogue to enter a command before running "Tools/Run"

BeforeRunDlgRuns "Before Run" dialogue and does its chosen action.

CheckTclCheck a current unit for errors, before running Tcl file.

ColorPickerCalls a color picker passing to it and getting from it a color.

ComForcedChecks whether a forced command is set.

CtrlC

CtrlV

CtrlX

DatePickerCalls a calendar to pick a date.

DeleteForcedRunHandler of "Delete forced command" button.

e_menuRuns e_menu.

e_menu1Runs e_menu.

e_menu2Runs e_menu.

e_menu3Prepares TF= argument for e_menu and runs e_menu's main menu.

EM_AllStructureGets all items of all menus.

EM_AllStructure1Gets recursively all items of all menus.

EM_commandGets e_menu command.

EM_dirReturns a directory of e_menu's menus.

EM_HotKeyReturns e_menu's hotkeys which numerate menu items.

EM_OptionsReturns e_menu's general options.

EM_optionTFPrepares TF= option for e_menu.

EM_SaveFilesSaves all files before running e_menu, if this mode is set in "Preferences".

EM_StructureGets a menu's items.

FormatDateFormats a date.

HelpCalls a help on alited.

HelpToolHandles hitting "Help" button in dialogues.

InsertInTextInsert a string into a text possibly instead of its selection.

is_emenuCheck for e_menu's existence.

is_mainmenuChecks if e_menu's arguments are for the main menu (run by F4).

LoupeCalls a screen loupe.

PopupBarOpens a popup menu in the tool bar, to enter e_menu's preferences.

Redo

RunArgsGets ARGS/RUNF arguments (similar to ::em::get_AR of e_menu.tcl).

RunModeRuns Tcl source file with choosing the mode - in console or in tkcon.

RunsRuns a list of Tcl/ext commands.

RunTclTry to run tcl source file by means of tkcon utility.

SrcPathGets a path to an external tool. This may be useful at calling alited by tclkit: tkcon, aloupe etc. may be located in "src" subdirectory of alited.

TestForcedRunHandler of "Run forced command" button.

tkconCalls Tkcon application.

tkconOptionsGets options of tkcon.tcl.

tkconPathGets the path to tkcon.tcl.

ToolButNameHelper procedure to get a name of toolbar button.

Undo

alited::tree

Commands

AddItemAdds a new item to the tree.

AddTagsCreates tags for the tree.

AddTagSelAdds tagSel tag to the unit tree's item.

AddToDirContentsAdds an item to a list of directory's contents.

AdjustWidthFixes a problem with the tree scrollbar's width at resizing the panes. The problem occurs if Frame's width is less than Tree's + Scrollbar's, as then the scrollbar is squeezed. Thus the Tree's width should be adjusted. The restart of alited will fully repair this.

ButtonMotionStarts moving an item of the tree.

ButtonPressHandles a mouse clicking the tree.

ButtonReleaseHandles a mouse button releasing on the tree, at moving an item.

CreateCreates a tree of units/files, at need.

CreateFilesTreeCreates a file tree.

CreateUnitsTreeCreates a unit tree for a tab.

CurrentItemGets ID of selected item of the tree.

CurrentItemByLineGets item ID of unit tree for a current text position.

DeleteRemoves recursively an item and its children from the tree.

DelItemRemoves an item from the tree.

DestroyMoveWindowDestroys an item moving window.

DirContentsReads a directory's contents.

DropItemsDrops (moves) selected items to a current position.

ExpandContractTreeExpands or contracts the tree.

ForEachScans all items of the tree.

GetDirectoryContentsGets a directory's contents.

GetTooltipGets a tip for unit / file tree's item.

GetTreeGets a tree or its branch.

IgnoredDirChecks if a directory is in the list of the ignored ones.

MoveItemMoves items of the tree (units or files)

NewItemIDGets a new ID for the tree item.

NewSelectionSelects a new item of the unit tree.

OpenFileOpens file at clicking a file tree's item.

RecreateTreeRecreates the tree and restores its selections.

SaveCursorPosSaves current unit's cursor position.

SeeSelectionSees (makes visible) a current selected item in the tree.

SelectUnitsSelects units at Ctrl/Shift clicking the unit tree.

ShowPopupMenuCreates and opens a popup menu at right clicking the tree.

SwitchTree

syOptionGets -geometry option of dialogues.

UnitTitleGets a title of a unit (checking for empty string).

UpdateFileTreeUpdates the file tree (colors of files).

alited::unit

Commands

AddRuns a dialog "Add Template" and adds a chosen template to a text.

BranchLinesGets a line range of a branch.

DeleteDeletes a unit from a text.

DropUnitsMoves unit(s) from one location in the unit tree to other.

GetHeaderGets a header of unit: declaration + initial comments.

GetUnitsGets a unit structure from a text.

InsertTemplateInserts a template into a current text.

MoveL1L2Moves a text lines to other location.

MoveUnitMoves a unit up/down the unit tree.

MoveUnitsMoves selected units up/down the unit tree.

SearchByHeaderGets tree item ID of a units by its header (declaration+initial comment).

SearchInBranchChecks whether a unit is in a branch.

SwitchUnitsSwitches between last two active units.

TemplateDataReplaces the template wildcards with data of current text and unit.

alited::unit_tpl

Commands

_createCreates "Templates" dialogue.

_runRuns "Templates" dialogue.

AddHandles "Add template" button.

CancelHandles "Cancel" button.

ChangeHandles "Change template" button.

ClearCbxHelper to clear the combobox's selection.

DeleteHandles "Delete template" button.

FocusSets the focus on the template list's item.

GetKeyListCreates a key list for "Keys" combobox.

HelpHandles "Help" button.

HelpMe'Help' for start.

ImportHandles "Import templates" button.

InTextGoes into the template's text and sets the cursor on it.

OkHandles "OK" button.

PosReturns a cursor position in the template's text.

ReadIniGets templates' data from al(TPL,list) saved in alited.ini.

RegisterKeysRegisters key bindings of templates, to save them to alited.ini afterwards.

SaveIniPuts templates' data to al(TPL,list) to save in alited.ini.

SelectSelects an item of the template list.

SelectedGets ID or index of currently selected item of the template list.

TextReturns the contents of the template's text.

UpdateTreeUpdates the template list.
